about_the_game:
Musical Weapons

In Survivors SymphonYs weapons are musical instruments and their attack patterns based on music. Each combination of weapons creates a musical variation – leading to over 28 million possible scores. The better your Instruments harmonize, the higher the tempo of the music and the more damage you deal. In addition to your musical weapons, you are also able to break bones, activate special attacks, and reflect bullets. Dash to the rhythm of the music for additional strength.  

Explore and Defend

Your goal is to survive 4 days, protect the last tree in your base and descent into the well of darkness to face the evil in the abyss. Explore 5 hand-crafted levels - filled with more than 150 unique monsters - and listen for new musicians to help your cause. But beware: While carving your path through hordes of enemies, your base will also be attacked by the evil lurking in the well. This calls for hard decisions to be made: Do you level up your weapons OR the defenders in your base? Do you keep exploring and gain more experience OR warp back to defend? Do you sacrifice HP to clear the base OR will this lead to an even quicker death?

                          

                                                  Warp back and clear the base.

Build your Base

In between runs you level up your stats, abilities, and buildings. Play all found musicians and assign them to buildings - to defend, raise stats and unlock new abilities! Each character has different effects on the buildings.

                                               Assign Characters to buildings.

Other Features:

  • Unlock 33 musicians and their weapons, 11 buildings, and 22 talismans.

  • This game is supposed to be challenging, but the difficulty is adjustable.

  • Play with Controller.

short_description: Survivors SymphonYs is a hybrid-auto-battler with musical weapons, dash abilities, rogue-lite and tower-defense elements. Explore 5 distinct Areas - listening for new characters - while defending your base from afar: level defenders, sacrifice HP, or warp back to protect your base!
